Package it.uniroma1.mdp.model

Class GameTable

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
it.uniroma1.mdp.model.GameTable
public class GameTable extends Observable
Represents the game table, which includes stock piles, discard piles, players, and cards. It manages the state of the game, dealing with initialization, player actions, and card handling. This class is observable to notify changes to its observers.
